Mission and Purpose

The Centre for Civil Society (CCS) is an international organisation for research, analysis, debate and learning about civil society. It is based within the Department of Social Policy at the London School of Economics. Established initially as the Centre for Voluntary Organisation, it has for over 20 years studied the voluntary sector in the UK, development NGOs and civil society organisations throughout the world.
